name: SunBell
0:
”Alexa, open the blind”
”Alexa, close the blind”
”Alexa, set blind to 30 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Create your own range of options, scheduling Sunbell integral blinds movements.

Create your own routines to control Sunbell integral blinds by using few simple steps, even when away from home.

An AI-SUN app (available for IOS and ANDROID) is required. The skill allows the management of Sunbell integral blinds through SUNCEN control system only.

To use the app, you need the latest SUNCEN control unit connected to the web (via LAN).

Existing owners can update their existing Suncen control unit to the new model to allow connectivity and use the new app
